scripts.prebuild:css: rm build/pivotal-cards.css; node-sass --include-path src/scss src/scss/pivotal-cards.scss build/pivotal-cards.css
scripts.build:css: postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' < build/pivotal-cards.css | postcss --use cssnano > pivotal-cards.css
scripts.build:js: rm build/pivotal-cards.js; browserify src/js/pivotal-cards.js -o build/pivotal-cards.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
